content.raw:
I addressed the comments. Now the three empty fields won't fire a warning. It is fired only when some fields are filled, but not the three of them.

I also moved the element to keep them sorted alphabetically.

ptal again @chapulina

A screenshot for the change:

I also moved the element to keep them sorted alphabetically.
